backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining property types, search filters, analytics structures, and integrating authorization, storage mixins, and migrations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor state structures and a migration function that currently returns the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to adding an admin-only frontend reset control.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/.env: Environment variables file containing the configured Google Maps API key and related setup notes.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required Google Maps API variables and setup instructions.
frontend/GOOGLE_MAPS_SETUP.md: Detailed documentation explaining how to configure Google Maps API keys, billing, restrictions, and environment setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element, favicon, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and page rendering with theme support.
frontend/src/components/AdminResetContro: Admin-only control that opens a confirmation dialog and triggers a full application data reset.
frontend/src/components/AgentForm.tsx: Form component for adding or editing agent profiles with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying organization info and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar managing login/logout, user display, and conditional admin navigation items.
frontend/src/components/MapLinkedInsight: Generates analytics charts and stats based on currently filtered map properties.
frontend/src/components/PropertyMap.tsx: Interactive Google Maps component with markers, clustering, filters, radius tools, heatmap, and autocomplete for property browsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, roles, agents, properties, and other domain actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AgentsPage.tsx: Admin-only UI for listing, adding, editing, and deactivating agents with role badges and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays key stats for agents, properties, and inquiries with loading states and category breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Manages viewing, creating, validating, and editing inquiries with dialogs, forms, and agent assignment.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Handles listing, adding, editing, filtering, and mapping of properties with image uploads and map-based search.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Generates analytics and charts for properties and inquiries with optional map-linked filtering.
frontend/src/types/google-maps.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for Google Maps types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters for routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending admin reset feature requests for managing app state resets and drafts.
